meanings.definition: Entertainment that is designed to educate.
meanings.sent1: The museum offers interactive edutainment for children to learn about history.
meanings.sent2: The documentary on marine life provided a perfect example of edutainment.
meanings.sent3: The edutainment show about space made learning fun and engaging.
meanings.sent4: The edutainment program transformed complex concepts into enjoyable content.
meanings.sent5: The edutainment game on math skills was both entertaining and educational.

meanings.definition: The act of educating through entertainment.
meanings.sent1: The edutainment industry has grown rapidly in recent years.
meanings.sent2: Parents appreciate the value of edutainment in teaching important lessons.
meanings.sent3: The school assembly featured an edutainment performance that captivated the students.
meanings.sent4: The edutainment approach to learning has proven to be effective for many students.
meanings.sent5: The edutainment workshop combined learning and fun seamlessly.
